fact.coordinates.HorizontalCoordinate

    Package Description
    fact.coordinates  

    • Uses of HorizontalCoordinate in fact.coordinates

      Methods in fact.coordinates that return HorizontalCoordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HorizontalCoordinate HorizontalCoordinate.fromDegrees(double zenithDeg, double azimuthDeg) 
      static HorizontalCoordinate HorizontalCoordinate.fromRad(double zenithRad, double azimuthRad) 
      HorizontalCoordinate CameraCoordinate.toHorizontal(HorizontalCoordinate pointingPosition, double focalLength)
      Transform this CameraCoordinate from camera frame to telescope (horizontal coordinates) frame for the given PointingPosition.
      HorizontalCoordinate EquatorialCoordinate.toHorizontal(ZonedDateTime observationTime, EarthLocation earthLocation)
      Transform this EquatorialCoordinate into the horizontal coordinate frame for given observation time and location.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      double HorizontalCoordinate.greatCircleDistanceRad(HorizontalCoordinate other) 
      CameraCoordinate HorizontalCoordinate.toCamera(HorizontalCoordinate pointingPosition, double focalLength)
      Transform this horizontal coordinate to the camera frame for the given pointing position and focal length.
      HorizontalCoordinate CameraCoordinate.toHorizontal(HorizontalCoordinate pointingPosition, double focalLength)
      Transform this CameraCoordinate from camera frame to telescope (horizontal coordinates) frame for the given PointingPosition.
